name: CAN_CREATE
description: A user can create or add records to the resource

name: CAN_READ
description: A user can read/see details of a record in a resource

name: CAN_UPDATE
description: A user can update/modify details of a record in a resource

name: CAN_DELETE
description: A user can delete a record in a resource

name: IS_DENIED
description: A user is denied all access to operations on a resource

name: IS_ALLOWED
description: A user is allowed all access to operations on a resource
